t: What to know about Amazon Pharmacy before you sign up
s: June 15, 2023 - Learn how Amazon is making it easier for customers to save time and money on their daily medications.

Amazon Pharmacy offers a wide selection of generic and brand medications used to treat chronic and acute health conditions. To find out if we can fill a specific prescription, search for a medication’s name on Amazon.com.

t: Amazon’s full-service online pharmacy makes it easy and affordable to shop for medication. Here's how it works.
s: February 9, 2023 - Amazon Pharmacy carries a large range of medications for common uses such as high blood pressure, high cholesterol, diabetes, depression, anxiety, birth control, and more. It’s also easy to identify generic versus name-brand items.
Prime members save up to 80%* on brand and generic medication at Amazon Pharmacy. We also make it easy to check your insurance copay and use coupons.

t: Amazon has quietly launched an exclusive line of over-the-counter health products
s: February 22, 2018 - Amazon sells branded over-the-counter medications such as Advil, Mucinex and Nicorette as well as options from Perrigo's generic GoodSense brand. Basic Care, Amazon's recently launched exclusive line of Perrigo OTC health products, is a possible challenge to pharmacy retail chains.
